body:
I want my own player model, something that doesn't infringe anyone's copyright.

As the simulated creature designer à la Spore (#19) progresses, I will naturally need demo characters, both organic and robotic.

Until then, I should build one from scratch using current tools to showcase the process. What should it look like? What kinds of characters work best with current tech? (No capes!)

This is only tangentially related to the mod itself, although it could become a mascot of sorts…
title: My avatars
